title: A Hill To Die On
description: Jade Stryker has never really known happiness, but she knows it when she finds it living in the Mexican highlands with the man she loves and their baby daughter.A phone call from a ghost from her past changes everything, and she is forced to leave her loved ones behind to rescue Kataryna, a beautiful and mysterious woman who once saved her life, and who is now ensnared in the clutches of a sex slavery ring in Manhattan.Jade feels honor bound to save Kataryna, but she knows that it will be a difficult and dangerous task, one that may well force her to choose which hill she wants to die on.
author: Peter Hogenkamp
